name: Certified CIO
overview: Certified CIO was originally founded in 1999 as Certified Instructors. In 2005 Certified CIO transitioned from “More than a training company” to “Your outsourced Chief Information Officer” as our focus shifted from our roots in training to offering outsourced CIO services to companies who may not have the size or need for a full time CIO position within their organization. We can be characterized as a full service network integration and solutions provider. Our solutions cut across a wide range of vertical industries from small and medium sized businesses to Fortune 100 companies. Our outsourced CIO services include managed Hardware and Software Support, Network and System Proactive monitoring (Pro-Cert), Network Services, Information Assurance, Offsite Backup, Web Design, and Internet Media Solutions for our clients using leading edge technologies, reusable components, proven processes, and business alliances.

milestones.description: Certified CIO Cancels Agreement with Kear IT
milestones.source_description: Certified CIO Cancels Agreement with Kear IT, Inc.
